heading: HB00124
0: AN ACT AMENDING SECTION 10 OF REPUBLIC ACT 7832 OTHERWISE KNOWN AS AN ACT PENALIZING THE PILFERAGE OF AND THEFT OF POWER TRANSMISSION LINES/MATERIALS, RATIONALIZING SYSTEM LOSSES BY PHASING OUT PILFERAGE A COMPONENT THEREOF, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on ENERGY since 2019-07-23
